item.title: About
item.description: Hi my name is Alex and i currently work at vault cloud as a cloud Admin (Customer support) I have graduated from UNSW Sydney with a degree in computer science. As proof, you can see my Testamur, Transcript and AHEGS. I am considering continuing my studies at AIE and specialise in Game Programming. test: test I am currently running on Manjaro Distro but i am considering switching to debian: https://manjarno.snorlax.sh/ Sure debian might be slower with the updates but it is stable as hell.
